snippet: The governor of New York made a reasonable decision in slowing down to review the health risks of hydraulic fracturing.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Gov Andrew Cuomo's decision to halt commencement of natural gas drilling in upstate New York so that officials can undertake a fresh examination of the potential environmental and health risks of hydraulic fracturing.
lead_paragraph: The governor of New York made a reasonable decision in slowing down to review the health risks of hydraulic fracturing.

headline.seo: Checkup for Natural Gas in New York
